long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus247: Manage Your CRM Contacts Seamlessly
Focus247 is a Chrome extension designed to streamline your CRM workflow by providing a convenient interface for adding and managing contacts on the go.

Key Features:

Effortless login: Quickly access your CRM system directly from your browser.
Simplified contact creation: Capture essential details like name, email, and country through user-friendly forms.
Seamless integration: Add new contacts directly into your CRM database with the help of our secure backend API integration.
Focus247 empowers you to:

Boost productivity: Save time and effort by managing contacts within your browsing experience.
Enhance data accuracy: Minimize errors by entering contact information directly in your CRM system.
Stay organized: Maintain a centralized contact database for efficient management.

Developed by Dscission Automation Limited, Focus247 is built with your efficiency and data security in mind. Download it today and experience the ease of managing your CRM contacts directly from your browser!
